title: Kansai: cradle of Japanese culture
creator_contributor_role: Japan. National Tourist Organisation, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Japan - Description and travel

description: A colorful description of the Kansai district, including the major cities, Iso, Nara, Kyoto and Wakayama. This district was the stage for the drama of Japanese history and has been and always will be the cradle of Japanese culture.
